title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When attempting to set the output location and classpath simultaneously, an error message is displayed stating 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently separate operations, and setting the output location first causes an illegal state.
OB: When pressing Ok, the error message 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src' is displayed.
EB: When setting the classpath and output location, the two operations should be combined into one cohesive action, preventing the creation of an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the project settings. 
2. Set the output location to /xy. 
3. Set the classpath to /xy/src. 
4. Press Ok. 
5. Observe the error message 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
